overview: Welcome to the House of Pleasure, a bizarre fantasy world where the exhilarating mistress Duscha doles out her own erotic prescription of pleasure and punishment. Check into this house, meet Gail, and witness her erotic humiliation at the hands of her angry, dominating mother. But do not enter this house unless you are prepared to witness some of the most bizarre and sexually exciting acts ever performed, for when Duscha catches poor Gail with a young Army stud, there's hell to pay for all concerned!
tagline: Your deepest desires will lead you to the house of pleasure.
title: House of Pleasure
